preparations.content:
Place water into mixing bowl, insert simmering basket and place eggs into it. Cook time according to taste/Varoma/speed 1 .  Cooking time depends on how you like your eggs:
10 minutes very runny (egg yolk liquid, egg white just set)
11 minutes runny (egg yolk liquid, egg white firm)
12 minutes soft (egg yolk soft)
13 minutes firm boiled
14 minutes hard boiled
Immediately remove simmering basket with spatula and place it with eggs under cold running water to cease cooking. Use as needed.
